import React from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let [memes, setMemes] = React.useState({ toptext: "s", bootmtext: "s", randdomImge: "https://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) let [allmemesImg, setAllmemesImg] = React.useState(memesData) let button = () => { let meme = allmemesImg.data.memes let randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random(meme) * meme.length) let randomMeme = meme[randomNumber].url } return (
) }
